name: Blundstone 492 The Chunk Sole - Unisex
description: Blundstone comfort and convenience with a little added toe protection. The Chunk Sole boots wrap the sole around the toe of your boots, giving your toes their own little bumper. The oversized custom engineered sole offers all-day comfort and support.Weatherproof leather upper, lined with leather for a softer and more durable wearing experience.Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction even in Canadian winters.PORON® XRD™ impact absorption in the heel offers all-day comfort.Pull loop for extra leverage.Round toe, medium width.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
